item.title: How Social Reading Should Work
item.description: I am becoming increasingly frustrated by the failure of all the major players to get social right. I have a very simple dream for how the social web should work and its baffling to me that many obvious use-cases have not been addressed at all by Facebook, Twitter, or Google. This is the first of two posts that will describe what I view as a viable framework for a social web experience.
